name: Triptych of the Well
description:
Some things should have been left to sleep, Kindred.
But that was never your way.

Triptych of the Well is a short vampire story in the World of Darkness's Vampire: the Masquerade setting with light dice mechanics and flavor inspired by the tabletop game's 5th Edition, set against the backdrop of the eschatological Gehenna War and foregrounded in personal tragedy.

This game was created as a part of Vampire: The Masquerade game jam. Events portrayed in this game are not canon within World of Darkness universe.

https://itch.io/jam/vtm

|| Content Warnings ||

- Blood, Gore

- Body horror (Insects;  Warped, molded, and misshapen flesh and bone; Damage to teeth; Profane birth)

- Extreme violence (Destruction of soft tissues (ie. eyes, facial features); Dislocated joints; Weaponized burning; Destructive sadomasochism; Opened bodies; Cannibalism; Impaling)

- Subversion of free will and choice (Mind manipulation; Compelled servitude (ie. with blood); Compelled self-harm)

- Sexualized language/description (Sadomasochism)
